channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden’s Florida legacy: An economic boom, a magnet for immigrants and a solidly conservative red state
item.description: No state has been more affected by the increase in immigrants than Florida, according to internal government data obtained by The Associated Press.

item.title: How the government shutdown will keep crucial data from investors and policymakers
item.description: The government shutdown that began Wednesday will deprive policymakers and investors of economic data vital to their decision-making at a time of unus...

item.title: Warren Buffett’s last big deal? Berkshire Hathaway to buy Occidental Petroleum’s chemical division for $9.7 billion
item.description: Buffett wasn’t mentioned in materials on the deal, potentially signaling a passing of the torch to Vice Chair Greg Abel, who will become CEO in Januar...

item.title: ‘We eat with our eyes’: Pepsi plays with purple sweet potatoes and various carrot colors as it races to remove dyes, says VP of R&D
item.description: “If you look at a plate of food, it’s generally the different kinds of colors that will tell you what you would like or not," exec Damien Browne says.

item.title: Iowa’s largest school district chooses to hire superintendent who lied about a doctorate as he sits in jail after immigration detention

item.title: Small Business Hiring Remains Steady Amid Initial Signs of Wider Job Cuts
item.description: Release of official statistics on job creation is cancelled by the government shutdown.

item.title: Tilly Norwood already has a Wikipedia page, and not even the editors are sure what to call it
item.description: It’s not just Hollywood that’s been grappling with how to deal with AI -generated characters. Wikipedia editors are figuring all this out as they go a...

item.title: Wall Street Doesn’t Care About a Government Shutdown
item.description: The S&P 500 hit a new record high as the government shutdown began.

item.title: Here’s Why You Don’t Want Your Teams to Get Along All the Time
item.description: Most leadership teams prioritize cohesion and cultural fit, but this approach kills innovation. Here’s why, and how to fix it.

item.title: More pasta recalled after deadly Listeria outbreak: List of stores includes Trader Joe’s and Albertsons

item.title: The 2025 Top 50 Leadership and Management Experts
item.description: Who makes my update list? More importantly, whom are some of the experts you should listen to?

item.title: Trump’s regulators are working on the biggest overhaul of U.S. capital rules since the 2008 recession
item.description: As President Donald Trump’s regulators revamp bank rules, big lenders expect their capital requirements could fall, in a stunning victory for the indu...

item.title: Coinbase exec Jesse Pollak on the coming Base token—and why we can trust corporate blockchains
item.description: Pollak discussed the token, and said Base is committed to decentralization.

item.title: 4 Tips for Handling a Top Performer’s Resignation Without Losing Momentum
